text: Civil War Museum can refer to: For the American Civil War: *African American Civil War Memorial, in Washington, D.C. *American Civil War Center at Historic Tredegar *Civil War Museum (Bardstown) *Civil War Museum of Philadelphia *Kenosha Civil War Museum *National Civil War Museum in Harrisburg, Pennsylvania *National Civil War Naval Museum at Port Columbus *New England Civil War Museum *Taggart Hall Civil War Museum & Visitors Center
title: Civil War Museum
